title: Way to stop settings from syncing from computer to computer?
body: While I mainly play league on my desktop, while I am at school I will sometimes be playing it on my laptop. The problem is, when on my laptop a lot of things in the game look smaller and it is hard to play. I know I can up scale the interface, but I am worried that it will sync the settings from my laptop to my desktop since I know all of the profiles are saved and synced. Will that be a problem, or is there any way to turn that off so I can have two separate setting profiles for two separate computers? Also quick question, is there any way to zoom in without the mouse wheel? I disabled that a while back but it seems it might help on my laptop.

replies.body: Since settings are saved server side, it will transfer between pc to pc.  You'll have to manually adjust your settings, but I can definitely see a need to have the specific to a pc.  Share your feedback with our client devs so they can look into this for consideration over at the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Thanks for the suggestion!
